00003 /**
00004  * @brief Browser class.
00005  * 
00006  * Used for basic browser detection.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Browser
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  * 
00015  * @required Function <a href="http://us3.php.net/function.get-browser">get_browser</a>. \b Read the notes.
00016  * @see http://us3.php.net/function.get-browser
00017  * @see http://browsers.garykeith.com/downloads.asp
00018  * @see http://us3.php.net/manual/en/misc.configuration.php#ini.browscap
00019  */
00020 
00021 class Boo_Browser {
00022     /**
00023      * @brief Browser object.
00024      * 
00025      * This object is loaded by the cunstructor.
00026      */
00027     protected static $browser;
00028     
00029     /**
00030      * @brief Default constructor.
00031      * @return void.
00032      */
00033     public function __construct() {
00034         self::start();
00035     }
00036     
00037     /**
00038      * @breif Starts the Boo_Browser object.
00039      * 
00040      * Loads \c self::$browser. Called from \c Boo_Browser::__construct().
00041      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00042      */
00043     public static function start() {
00044         
00045         if (!isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])) {
00046             trigger_error('No user agent, can not continue', E_USER_NOTICE);
00047             self::$browser = new Boo_Null;
00048             return false;
00049         }
00050         
00051         self::$browser = get_browser();
00052         
00053         if (!self::$browser) {
00054             trigger_error('Function get_browser() failed', E_USER_WARNING);
00055             self::$browser = new Boo_Null;
00056             return false;
00057         } else {
00058             return true;
00059         }
00060     }
00061     
00062     /**
00063      * @brief Determins if the browser is in the IE family.
00064      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00065      */
00066     public static function isIe() { return self::$browser->browser == 'IE'; }
00067     
00068     /**
00069      * @brief Determins if the browser is IE 6.
00070      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00071      */
00072     public static function isIe6() { return self::$browser->browser == 'IE' && self::$browser->majorver == 6; }
00073     
00074     /**
00075      * @brief Determins if the browser is IE 7.
00076      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00077      */
00078     public static function isIe7() { return self::$browser->browser == 'IE' && self::$browser->majorver == 7; }
00079     
00080     /**
00081      * @brief Determins if the browser is IE 8.
00082      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00083      */
00084     public static function isIe8() { return self::$browser->browser == 'IE' && self::$browser->majorver == 8; }
00085     
00086     /**
00087      * @brief Determins if the browser is in the Firefox family.
00088      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00089      */
00090     public static function isFirefox() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Firefox'; }
00091     
00092     /**
00093      * @brief Determins if the browser is Firefox 2.
00094      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00095      */
00096     public static function isFirefox2() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Firefox' && self::$browser->majorver == 2; }
00097     
00098     /**
00099      * @brief Determins if the browser is Firefox 3.
00100      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00101      */
00102     public static function isFirefox3() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Firefox' && self::$browser->majorver == 3; }
00103     
00104     /**
00105      * @brief Determins if the browser is in the Opera family.
00106      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00107      */
00108     public static function isOpera() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Opera'; }
00109     
00110     /**
00111      * @brief Determins if the browser is Opera 9.
00112      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00113      */
00114     public static function isOpera9() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Opera' && self::$browser->majorver == 9; }
00115     
00116     /**
00117      * @brief Determins if the browser is in the Safari family.
00118      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00119      */
00120     public static function isSafari() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Safari'; }
00121     
00122     /**
00123      * @brief Determins if the browser is Safari 2.
00124      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00125      */
00126     public static function isSafari2() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Safari' && self::$browser->majorver == 2; }
00127     
00128     /**
00129      * @brief Determins if the browser is Safari 3.
00130      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00131      */
00132     public static function isSafari3() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Safari' && self::$browser->majorver == 3; }
00133     
00134     /**
00135      * @brief Determins if the browser is Chrome.
00136      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00137      */
00138     public static function isChrome() { return self::$browser->browser == 'Chrome'; }
00139     
00140     /**
00141      * @brief Returns a string representing the browser name.
00142      * @return string The browser name.
00143      */
00144     public static function getBrowserName() { return self::$browser->browser; }
00145     
00146     /**
00147      * @brief Returns the browser object.
00148      * @return object The browser object.
00149      */
00150     public static function getBrowser() { return self::$browser; }
00151     
00152     /**
00153      * @brief Returns the version number of the browser.
00154      * @return string The version number.
00155      */
00156     public static function getVersion() { return self::$browser->version; }
00157     
00158     /**
00159      * @brief Returns the major version number of the browser.
00160      * @return string The major version number.
00161      */
00162     public static function getMajorVersion() { return self::$browser->majorver; }
00163     
00164     /**
00165      * @brief Returns the minor version number of the browser.
00166      * @return string The minor version number.
00167      */
00168     public static function getMinorVersion() { return self::$browser->minorver; }
00169 }
